title.rendered: Jennifer Mead Named Middle School Health Education Teacher of the Year

content.rendered:
Congratulations to Jennifer Mead, who has been named the 2022 Middle School Health Education Teacher of the Year by the New York State Association for Health, Physical Education, Recreation and Dance (NYS AHPERD).  This award recognizes teachers who distinguish themselves in their profession and show a commitment to students and health education.

Ms. Mead is in her second year as a  health teacher at Maple Avenue Middle School and has taught health and physical education for a total of twelve years.  In addition to her role as a teacher, she serves on the PBIS Committee, and was recently trained to serve as an Ally for students.  She has also served as the Lake Avenue Elementary School PTA Wellness Committee Chair and in various leadership and committee roles for the NYS AHPERD organization.

Ms. Mead will be recognized for the award at the NYS AHPERD conference held in November.
